snippet.title: Old Love: Story | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Old Love: Story is a marvelous romantic story, a mixture of pure love, welfare and also sadness.. it makes us think again about our relationship with the elderly.
Android Game: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.AhmedEssid.OldLoveStory

Game DEMO (First Chapter) for free: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.AhmedEssid.OldLoveStoryDemo

Old Love is an interactive storytelling and adventure game based on a unique and romantic love story about an old man Tom who lives alone and sad since the death of his wife Lea, but one day he had the chance to get back in time to three years, to the day of his wife's death to make her the happiest elderly woman in Oldland, to change the events of that day and be with her until the last breath before she leaves again.

Trailer Music: 'Shining Stars' by Rafael Krux (released under CC BY 4.0).
Sound Effects: Ahmed Essid ..
“ Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com “..

Initial Release Date : February, 2020.
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oldo.studio
Our Website: https://www.oldostudios.com
